maze.logic

Class Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.logic.Builder

  • public class Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class to launch game with our settings.
    Author:
    Diogo Trindade, Rui Vilares

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder()
      Constructs and initializes a builder for classic mode.
      Builder(int optionD, int optionS, int size)
      Constructs and initializes a builder for random mode.

        Returns:
